name: Library Management System
desc: The Library Management System is a Python application to manage books in a library. It allows users to add, view, borrow, and return books through a menu-driven interface.

name: Recommendation-System
desc: The Recommendation System is a Python project that uses filtering techniques to suggest movies based on user preferences and moods.

name: Multi-Page Business Website
desc: The Multi-Page Business Website is a responsive project with pages like Home, About, Services, Blog, and Contact. It ensures seamless navigation across devices.

name: Ecommerce Website
desc: The Ecommerce Website is a multi-functional platform for managing online shopping activities. It provides a user-friendly interface for product browsing,cart management.

name: To-Do-List Restaurant
desc: The project is an advanced to-do list application for managing daily tasks efficiently. It uses HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a responsive interface.

name: Calculator
desc: The Calculator is a web app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript that performs basic arithmetic operations.
